description:
Lazy consensus on the mailing-list is that we should rename XenAPI virt-layer variables so they follow a consistent naming scheme. The proposal is to use

1. Suffix "_ref" for opaque references

2. Suffix "_uuid" for UUIDs

3. Suffix "_rec" for record objects (the original proposal called for just 'vm', but "_rec" is more explicit and will maintain consistency with xenapi/plugins.

To Fix:

Hunt down all misnamed variables and replace according to the guidelines above. Also, include a comment that describes these guidelines in the xenapi_conn.py file so that the standard remains well-known.
title: XenAPI naming-scheme rework
